title: Exploring the Shadow
description:
The concept of the shadow originates from Jungian psychology, and has been popularised in the last few years, most notably by the success of the Canadian psychologist and public intellectual Jordan Peterson.

Arran Rogerson and Alyssa Polizzi are the hosts of the Golden Shadow podcast. A couple of months ago they began an exploration into the shadow, speaking to prominent writers and speakers in the Jungian community and beyond.

This film includes clips with James Hollis, Lisa Marciano, Chris Gabriel (Meme Analysis) and Michael Meade.

Arran and Alyssa will be hosting a live event in the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire soon, to join, check out: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

Their Golden Shadow podcast can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Ym8SqdvukWF5U4AOEAYEg
